src:
Alumnos del Senet visitaron el Senado

05 Nov 2019, 05:00

En el marco del proyecto “Me formo como ciudadano responsable”, alumnos del 5º grado “A” y “B” turno tarde del Colegio Rodolfo Senet visitaron días atrás el Senado provincial. Acompañados de las docentes Olga Saavedra y Luisa Carrizo, durante el recorrido fueron recibidos por el director de Protocolo, Eduardo Segura, y el secretario parlamentario, Omar Kranevitter, y recorrieron la biblioteca “Mario Dardo Aguirre”, el estudio de grabación “Raúl Alejandro Nieva” y el recinto “Fray Mamerto Esquiú”. También lo visitó el 5º grado “C” turno mañana, encabezado por la vicedirectora Silvia Jiménez y el docente Erick Rodríguez Martínez.
text:
Senet students visited the Senate

05 Nov 2019, 05:00

Within the framework of the project "I am trained as a responsible citizen", 5th grade students "A" and "B" late shift of Rodolfo Senet College visited the provincial Senate days ago. Accompanied by the teachers Olga Saavedra and Luisa Carrizo, during the tour they were received by the director of Protocol, Eduardo Segura, and the parliamentary secretary, Omar Kranevitter, and toured the library "Mario Dardo Aguirre", the recording studio "Raúl Alejandro Nieva "And" Fray Mamerto Esquiú ". He was also visited by 5th grade “C” tomorrow shift, headed by Deputy Director Silvia Jiménez and Professor Erick Rodríguez Martínez.
